title: Quarkus Tools for Visual Studio Code - 1.10.0 release
content: Quarkus Tools for Visual Studio Code 1.10.0 has been released on the VS Code Marketplace & Open VSX. For a list of all changes, please refer to the changelog. It’s been about 8 months since our last release of Quarkus Tools for VS Code. 8 months!! That’s a really long...
